Articles.Content: I think, a mod that changes the smoke/plumes of rocket engines to be a volumetric 3D mesh instead of sprites will make it look better, consume less resources and will be able to stay on screen for longer...

I'm no expert but I'm decently sure that volumetric meshes are more expensive than sprites.

 

If you want better plumes then know about the mod RealPlume and its respective dependencies. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/130576-105-realplume-stock-configs-continued-v094-201622/
